alert.note: Alert for Falls (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Falls County through 330 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lott, or 12 miles southwest of Marlin, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rosebud, Lott, Golinda, Chilton, Wilson, Wilderville, Barclay, Mooreville, Terrys Chapel, Highbank, Pleasant Grove, Durango, Cego, Travis, Cedar Springs, Westphalia and Tomlinson Hill. This includes Interstate 35 near mile marker 314. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
